doc.after: The increased understanding of forest dynamics in the late 20th century has led the scientific community to identify a need to inventory understand manage and conserve representative examples of old growth forests with their associated characteristics and values 38 The literature around old growth and its management is inconclusive about the best way to capture the true essence of an old growth stand
